title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 July 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:16 <cjd> has quit  
00:18 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
00:26 <vmassol> has quit  
00:37 <polx> has quit  
00:39 <evalica> has quit  
00:47 <jvdrean> has quit  
02:00 <mflorea> has quit  
02:09 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
02:37 <mflorea> has quit  
02:39 <tekzilla> has quit  
02:40 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
03:11 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
05:04 <ssavi> has quit  
05:07 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
07:21 <irssi\_> has joined #xwiki  
07:21 <irssi\_> is now known as <cjd>  
07:28 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
07:44 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:07 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
08:29 <vmassol> good morning  
08:30 <vmassol> we need to release 4.1.3 today  
08:30 <vmassol> we don't have any blocker open AFAIK  
08:31 <vmassol> AndreasJonsson: good morning  
08:31 <vmassol> I've noticed 2 issues in the chart macro  
08:31 <vmassol> 1) ChartMacroParameters (public) uses internal DataSource  
08:31 <vmassol> 2) The DataSource interface (internal) not nice, since one need to call method before another one!!  
08:32 <vmassol> are you planning to fix this?  
08:32 <CIA-114> Vincent Massol master \* rc5124f6 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/c5124f673db30629191cdb223bca0776f1e13468 / (47 files in 12 dirs): [Misc] Move Chart macro sources under one package (was under 2 different packages) - http://git.io/sg2kkw  
08:32 <CIA-114> Vincent Massol master \* rb874daf https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/b874dafc7d187e9d825409806a5afb78b08bbe96 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/web/TempResourceAction.java : [Misc] Added javadoc - http://git.io/vYfgIQ  
08:35 <evalica> has quit  
08:53 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:11 <CIA-114> tmortagne master \* ra49cc4a https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/a49cc4adb0ef2b6a78c6c77ee716ba98c567bcbd / xwiki-platform-core/pom.xml : XWIKI-8011: When saving a wiki macro document the author of the macro should be used to check right instead of the current user - http://git.io/NPd7lg  
09:14 <vmassol> AndreasJonsson: ping  
09:18 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:36 <CIA-114> tmortagne master \* rcf55726 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/cf557260538378b70165e9f9a3968320fc37cc82 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-chart/xwiki-platform-chart-macro/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rendering/internal/macro/chart/source/LocaleConfiguration.java : Fix header - http://git.io/Jp97hQ  
11:16 <tmortagne> has quit  
11:16 <tmortagne1> has joined #xwiki  
12:11 <CIA-114> tmortagne feature-extensiondistribution \* r74cd304 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/74cd3042f1611b1cc59287045bb65e432ce76383 / (3 files in 3 dirs): XCOMMONS-202: Find a way to have the war in the core extension list (+9 more commits...) - http://git.io/An6fHg  
12:12 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
12:18 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:37 <ssavi> has quit  
13:27 <vmassol> hello  
13:27 <vmassol> is there anyone who would have the time to perform the 4.1.3 release today?  
13:30 <polx> has quit  
13:31 <vmassol> it's important we release it asap  
14:39 <CIA-114> Vincent Massol master \* r8e3c406 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/8e3c4066aaa17b0906b8b7f737717314022af213 / (5 files): XCOMMONS-214: Make it easier to register mock components from within Test suites - http://git.io/Z\_pSQA  
14:40 <vmassol> devs, in case you haven't noticed it yet, this can be useful to you when writing integration tests: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XCOMMONS-214  
14:50 <CIA-114> Vincent Massol master \* r8188677 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/81886775689ee6ae60feefb2f9b35734f95093dd / xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-test/src/main/java/org/xwiki/test/AbstractMockingComponentTestCase.java : XCOMMONS-214: Make it easier to register mock components from within Test suites - http://git.io/6d5DHQ  
15:08 <vmassol> cjd: ping  
15:08 <vmassol> cjd: I continue to find it very disturbing that getting the temporary directory requires the permanent directory… that's really wrong from my pov  
15:09 <vmassol> we should be able to not have a perm directory at all in commons  
15:09 <vmassol> as a consquence almost all our tests using the temp dir generate this:  
15:10 <vmassol> 15:06:42.159 [main] WARN  o.x.e.internal.StandardEnvironment - No permanent directory configured. Using temporary directory [/var/folders/v9/\_395qc791vz23qdwyptvs06m0000gn/T/].  
15:10 <vmassol> could you fix it?  
15:10 <vmassol> I'm loathe to modify all our unit tests to set the perm dir when the test and the code under tests don't need it!  
15:30 <+AndreasJonsson> vmassol:  I plan to work a bit more on the ChartMacro, and I will take your comments into account.  
15:30 <vmassol> AndreasJonsson: i'm about to commit stuff in a few minutes  
15:30 <vmassol> I've fixed a few things  
15:30 <+AndreasJonsson> No, problems.  
15:30 <vmassol> re the image unique id I was wrong  
15:31 <vmassol> there's no hashcode method in ChartMacroParameters  
15:31 <vmassol> thus hashcode always return a different value  
15:31 <vmassol> even for chart macros in the same page  
15:31 <vmassol> and we cannot really cache the images for a longer duration  
15:31 <vmassol> (since their behavior can be scripted)  
15:47 <sburjan> has quit  
15:51 <tmortagne1> has quit  
15:52 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
16:11 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
16:17 <CIA-114> Vincent Massol master \* re19a83d https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/e19a83dd75cf29980e878ee56b93b5f101e21256 / (28 files in 13 dirs): XWIKI-8012: Replace usage of Charting action in the Chart Macro by Temporary action - http://git.io/GUuIYQ  
16:17 <CIA-114> Vincent Massol master \* rbe1052f https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/be1052fafa859cebe2b951f9027832aa5393180b / pom.xml : XWIKI-8012: Replace usage of Charting action in the Chart Macro by Temporary action - http://git.io/fOpURw  
16:19 <vmassol> AndreasJonsson: done, would be good if you check what I've modified  
16:23 <CIA-114> tmortagne master \* r64c2869 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/64c28692275021aeb62077c9f6d20a5e14941b3c / xwiki-enterprise-database/pom.xml : Generate WikiMacro classes - http://git.io/EaFCZg  
16:24 <CIA-114> Vincent Massol master \* r41221d2 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/41221d22b0a5600e80d2ebe7fcd26c26b5dae232 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-8012: Replace usage of Charting action in the Chart Macro by Temporary action - http://git.io/oCbzhg  
16:35 <D-Spair> has joined #xwiki  
16:36 <D-Spair> Hello all... I was looking through Google and XWiki.org to see if there is a known issue with the adding of tags on Google Chrome...  
16:36 <D-Spair> I keep having the page freeze up on me and have to kill the browser tab.  
16:36 <CIA-114> tmortagne feature-extensiondistribution \* r4849f82 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/4849f824d4be19a31483e1fc57da420cef47e2cc / (7 files in 3 dirs): XWIKI-7896: Display a global install/upgrade wizard when starting an new version of an XWiki instance (+18 more commits...) - http://git.io/vfNK-A  
16:36 <D-Spair> Anyone aware of this issue?  
16:37 <vmassol> I've noticed this too a few months ago  
16:37 <CIA-114> tmortagne master \* re592202 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/e592202f6909f8db794f24ce2c4ae493daea2f73 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/XWiki.java : XWIKI-8013: ApplicationReadyEvent event is sent before XWikiStubContextProvider is initialized - http://git.io/bENq1w  
16:37 <vmassol> but I haven't raised any issue about at the time and I don't recall any existing issue  
16:38 <vmassol> feel free to create a jira issue with the max information to reproduce  
16:38 <vmassol> (D-Spair)  
16:38 <D-Spair> vmassol:  OK, will do.  
16:39 <+sburjan`> works for me on xwiki.org and Chrome 20  
16:40 <vmassol> sburjan`: it was working for me too  
16:40 <vmassol> but not all the time  
16:40 <vmassol> it was under some conditions  
16:41 <D-Spair> vmassol:  What "component" should it be listed under? I'm pretty certain it's either a JavaScript error or an AJAX error.  
16:41 <vmassol> D-Spair: web & templates  
16:42 <vmassol> s/web & templates/web/  
16:42 <D-Spair> vmassol:  JIRA says that is not a valid "component".  
16:42 <D-Spair> vmassol:  "Web" turns up nothing in the form.  
16:42 <vmassol> XWIKI project  
16:43 <D-Spair> Gotcha, thanks!  
16:44 <CIA-114> tmortagne master \* r42f8574 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/42f8574bbefa853a819bc90ea331dfb9d1879c6c / (9 files in 7 dirs): Merge branch 'feature-extensiondistribution' (+6 more commits...) - http://git.io/6XiPSw  
16:48 <D-Spair> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8015  
16:49 <vmassol> thanks  
16:52 <D-Spair> Thank you! I'd have to use something else for documentation if XWiki didn't exist, and I REALLY like xwiki.  
16:54 <vmassol> D-Spair: cool :) Do we have a testimonial from you on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/References/Testimonials ? ;)  
16:54 <vmassol> actually I can reuse the one you've just sent ;)  
16:55 <vmassol> done :)  
16:56 <CIA-114> Vincent Massol master \* ra13a207 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/a13a20765ff24b779ec2673df8eb95fdc47655dd / xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-test/src/main/java/org/xwiki/test/MockingComponentManager.java : XCOMMONS-214: Make it easier to register mock components from within Test suites - http://git.io/POv\_Cg  
16:56 <CIA-114> Vincent Massol master \* r0b3a4cb https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/0b3a4cb0e30e11f619fd8f741319d8610610a5fa / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-dashboard/xwiki-platform-dashboard-macro/src/test/java/org/xwiki/rendering/macro/dashboard/IntegrationTest.java : XCOMMONS-214: Make it easier to register mock components from within Test suites - http://git.io/S3bTYg  
16:57 <D-Spair> vmassol:  I can do better than that little snippet... Gimme a few minutes.  
16:58 <vmassol> hehe  
17:00 <D-Spair> OK, there... That's a little better.  
17:01 <vmassol> indeed nicer  
17:01 <vmassol> fixing quote  
17:24 <CIA-114> Vincent Massol master \* r5fd745a https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/5fd745ab1a0f8948a34cda891aaa06eba454dea4 / (11 files in 10 dirs): XCOMMONS-214: Make it easier to register mock components from within Test suites - http://git.io/0hhojQ  
17:27 <Enygma`> has quit  
17:28 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
17:34 <Enygma`> has quit  
17:38 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
17:41 <@cjd> hi vmassol, I didn't realize the getting the permanent dir to get the temp dir bothered you, it is actually just for a tiny "safty feature" which Denis suggested to stop the admin if he configures the permanent directory to be inside of the delete-on-startup part of the temp dir.  
17:41 <@cjd> It's quite trivial to fix just by removing that check and the check doesn't offer much since there are many many ways to break a system.  
17:42 <vmassol> cjd: I don't know about you or others but I have a strong feeling there's a SOC issue here  
17:42 <@cjd> SOC?  
17:42 <vmassol> (it's more than feelings actually ;))  
17:42 <vmassol> Separation Of Concern  
17:43 <vmassol> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Separation\_of\_concerns  
17:43 <vmassol> it's a pompous way of saying that tmp dir and perm dir should be separate notions as much as possible  
17:44 <vmassol> :)  
17:44 <@cjd> yes, I don't really see a serious issue since they're both handled in the same module anyway but the warnings in tests are not that great and the offending code offers almost nothing.  
17:44 <vmassol> if you agree, cool :)  
17:45 <@cjd> So no big deal to change it at my end, it's actually just deleting 14 lines.  
17:45 <vmassol> guys any idea with compilation fails here: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/2264/consoleFull  
17:45 <vmassol> it builds fine locally  
17:46 <vmassol> apparently it's the Map in                 allowing(mockSsfx).use(with("uicomponents/container/columns.css"), with(any(Map.class)));  
17:47 <vmassol> why would unchecked conversion make the compiler fail now?  
17:48 <vmassol> I guess I can use the annotation to remove the check but I don't understand why our compiler fails now  
17:48 <Denis1> vmassol, cjd: what is offending ?  
17:49 <@cjd> The check to see if the admin has put the permanent dir inside of the temp dir means loading the permanent dir when the temp dir is loaded.  
17:49 <@cjd> This causes a warning in tests where the permanent dir is not set  
17:49 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
17:50 <@cjd> I'm for axing the check since it offers basicly nothing in terms of safety, there are so many interesting ways for an admin to break their system, we're not really helping.  
17:51 <vmassol> the main issue is that getting the temporary dir shouldn't ask for the perm dir to be set  
17:51 <vmassol> that's plain wrong to me  
17:52 <CIA-114> Vincent Massol master \* rc9dec41 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/c9dec41d018c20816d973b65f2473a6bb0dbb4a8 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-dashboard/xwiki-platform-dashboard-macro/src/test/java/org/xwiki/rendering/macro/dashboard/IntegrationTest.java : [Misc] Trying to stop compiler from complaining - http://git.io/1lSglQ  
17:53 <+Denis> I agree, but what afraid me initially is that older configuration does not make a clear distinction between permanent and non-permanent stuff  
17:54 <+Denis> since now permanent may contains really critical stuff like attachemment storage, what we should really prevent, is to have an issue that delete the permanent data while we were trying to clean the temporary one  
17:57 <@cjd> Denis: if you set the temp dir and permanent dir to the same location, you won't have the problem  
17:57 <@cjd> only if you set the permanent dir to /your/temp/dir/xwiki-temp/  
17:57 <@cjd> xwiki-temp is a magic word for the subdirectory which is deleted on start  
17:58 <CIA-114> Vincent Massol master \* rec6492a https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/ec6492a3179050de837f8b4f0066a2ce87218309 / (81 files in 9 dirs): XWIKI-8016: Remove the Chart plugin - http://git.io/bHpyxg  
17:58 <+Denis> what happen for old configuration use work in xwiki.cfg, and nothing in xwiki.properties for example ?  
17:59 <@cjd> it will make it's own decision which will be sane  
17:59 <evalica1> has joined #xwiki  
18:00 <Enygma`> has quit  
18:01 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
18:01 <evalica> has quit  
18:07 <+Denis> if we 100% sure all decision will be sane, I have nothing to add  
18:09 <vmassol> Denis: the only thing I'm 100% sure off is that forcing to have a perm dir when getting the tmp dir is wrong… :)  
18:09 <vmassol> bbiab  
18:14 <+Denis> well, I have never request that  
18:25 <CIA-114> tmortagne feature-extensiondistribution \* r2cddf7b https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/2cddf7b426463e8fbf28d988b28a7c4ec0b2b1a6 / (3 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-7896: Display a global install/upgrade wizard when starting an new version of an XWiki instance - http://git.io/\_nfmzA  
18:25 <CIA-114> tmortagne master \* r8278ec1 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/8278ec1c268d9afa28e84072ce9d5ca1f1ef6932 / xwiki-platform-core/pom.xml : XWIKI-8017: Upgrade to JGroups 3.1.0 - http://git.io/hws2nA  
18:34 <+tmortagne> vmassol: another unchecked build failure on platform I cannot reproduce locally and it's not new code so something changed on agent-2 if not all jenkins  
18:35 <+tmortagne> there is absolutely no reason for it to get an error instead of a warning  
18:35 <+tmortagne> it's like java compiler had a weird setup on errors/warnings  
18:36 <+tmortagne> yours was on agent-1 so I guess it's all jenkins for some reason  
18:37 <vmassol> tmortagne: yeah it beats me too  
18:38 <+tmortagne> what weird is that it build a lot of stuff before failing and I'm sure there is the exact same situation in the stuff it built before failing  
18:39 <+tmortagne> it's not like it was something rare  
18:41 <+tmortagne> I can see the same things but printed as warning in previous projects  
18:41 <+tmortagne> in http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/2264/consoleFull  
18:41 <+tmortagne> (not the same classes but same use case)  
18:45 <CIA-114> tmortagne master \* r95b2f3f https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/95b2f3f4844aad13fb1057e874d1a28f4add2250 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-script/src/main/java/org/xwiki/extension/script/internal/safe/SafeCoreExtensionRepository.java : XCOMMONS-202: Find a way to have the war in the core extension list - http://git.io/ud1ixw  
18:48 <tmortagne> has quit  
19:07 <jvdrean> has quit  
19:18 <ries> has left #xwiki  
19:55 <vmassol> guys do you see the image nicely or is it all pinky? http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/References/BestVentes#Attachments  
19:55 <evalica1> it's pinky  
19:55 <vmassol> strange because when I view the attachments it's ok  
19:56 <evalica1> same  
19:56 <vmassol> so it's the resize algo  
19:56 <vmassol> which isn't performant on jpg maybe  
19:57 <vmassol> trying png  
19:57 <evalica1> I guess since removing ?width fixes it  
19:58 <vmassol> but we don't want that :)  
19:58 <vmassol> it's good for me now  
19:59 <evalica1> yes - it's ok  
20:11 <vmassol> has quit  
20:25 <polx> Hello XWiki experts, could anyone suggest me a component that could be used to display "alerts" ?  
20:25 <evalica1> what about the {{warning}} macro  
20:25 <evalica1> ?  
20:25 <polx> I'm thinking of alerts posted to a user's session in the background and displayed to the user anytime he is ready.  
20:25 <evalica1> or notifications mechanism  
20:26 <polx> As far as I could read the notifications mechanism is the WatchList... or have I badly read?  
20:26 <polx> One use case could be the request to upgrade the profile in some way.  
20:26 <polx> Another could be a request to join a network.  
20:26 <evalica1> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/XWikiNotifications  
20:28 <polx> Interesting.  
20:29 <polx> But this is triggered by a javascript call, itself probably by rendering, correct?  
20:29 <evalica1> don't know :) .. it's javascript all right, I don't think the rendering is involved  
20:30 <polx> I meant... it's js so it's triggered by an in-page JS.  
20:31 <evalica1> never used them … I know they exist. The notifications are bundled by default. They are used in the Save page mechanism, etc. I don't think is an in-page JS, maybe they are called from xwiki.js - but don't know for sure  
20:31 <polx> Fine. Thanks.  
20:32 <polx> I think the back-end is missing to me... when it is filed into the session... how are they prioritized to be displayed.  
20:32 <evalica1> not in xwiki.js .. they have their on notifications.js  
20:32 <evalica1> \*own  
20:36 <evalica1> has quit  
21:14 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
21:55 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
23:26 <abusenius> has quit
